sqlMap.select: select * from program where state=0 limit $start$,$length$
select count(*) from program where compdate >= #monday# and compdate <=#sunday#

select * from program where (evaluatedate >= #monthstart# and evaluatedate < #monthend#) or (systestdate >= #monthstart# and systestdate < #monthend#) or (modelevaluatedate >= #monthstart# and modelevaluatedate < #monthend#) or (subassdate >= #monthstart# and subassdate < #monthend#)
select t2.* from importanteve t1,program t2 where t1.month=$month$ and t1.event=t2.proid
